Text: Correction: ENGLISH, not Swedish external subtitle files included.

Many thanks, near two years later :)

I downloaded this.  It's in French, with no subtitles as far as I can see.  I am trying to view it with Windows Media Player.  It plays fine, but no subtitles.  Even when I select the option in WMP to "show subtitles, if available" -- nothing.

Any suggestions?  Thanks.
@AZMovieFan: Just get VLC player, it will automatically play subtitles so long as they have the same name as the video file and are in the same folder.
